---
title: "EAD API"
subtitle: "Expected Annual Damage Types and Functions"
engine: julia
execute:
  echo: false
---

The `ICOW.EAD` module provides SimOptDecisions integration for expected annual damage computation.
See [EAD Model](../ead/model.qmd) for conceptual overview and [EAD Details](../ead/details.qmd) for usage examples.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using ICOW
using ICOW.EAD

for n in sort(collect(names(ICOW.EAD)))
    n == :EAD && continue
    n == :simulate && continue  # from SimOptDecisions re-export
    n == :value && continue     # from SimOptDecisions re-export
    obj = getfield(ICOW.EAD, n)
    println("## `$n`\n")
    d = Base.Docs.doc(obj)
    println(d)
    println()
end
```
